title: GAME SETTINGS
text:
Pack difficulty is rated on a scale from ! to !!!!!.

Please note: any card packs rated !!!! or higher will require you to enable NSFW mode to access them (this can be found in the settings).

title: DRINKING SETTINGS
text:
Enable Drinking Punishments and
Drink Wheel to add drinking forfeits!

This feature also requires NSFW mode to be enabled in your settings.
